channel.title: k-means clustering on Ensar Basri Kahveci
channel.description: Recent content in k-means clustering on Ensar Basri Kahveci

item.title: K-Means Clustering with 80 lines of Scala
item.description: I just implemented the K-Means clustering algorithm with 80 lines of Scala. read and createRandomCentroids methods are quite dummy and can be written much better. You can access to the gist via https://gist.github.com/metanet/a385d42fd2cab9f3d20e
